title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2458/95 of 19 October 1995 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
header:
21.10.1995 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 253/1
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2458/95
of 19 October 1995
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN codes indicated in column 2 of the said table.

Binding tariff information issued by the customs authorities of Member States which do not conform to the rights established by this Regulation can continue to be invoked under the provisions of Article 12 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92 for a period of three months.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 October 1995.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 167, 21. 7. 1995, p. 7.
(3)  OJ No L 302, 19. 10. 1992, p. 1.
ANNEX
Description of goods Classification CN code Reason
(1) (2) (3)
Coverings designed to be permanently fixed to the front and rear seat-stuffing and -frames of motor vehicles, and made up as follows:
— a seat-bottom with an external surface mainly of synthetic fabric (polyester) and plastics (PVC). Inside, there is a flexible metal rod;
— a seat-back with an external surface mainly of synthetic fabric (polyester) and plastics (PVC). Inside, there are:
— tapes with plastic fastenings,
— a rubber strap and
— flexible metal rods.
— a headrest-covering with an external surface mainly of synthetic fabric (polyester), and plastics (PVC).
